page.title: Settings
page.description: Tune appearance, language, and accessibility for a consistent workflow. All settings are stored locally and sync with server profile when UI SDK is integrated.

theme.title: Theme & Typography
theme.description: Match the brand tone while keeping your preferred view.

system.label: Follow system
system.description: Automatically switches based on OS settings.

light.label: Light mode
light.description: Bright and clean tone, suitable for daytime monitoring.

dark.label: Dark mode
dark.description: Calm contrast, suitable for nighttime and low-light environments.

language.title: Locale & formatting
language.description: Language, date, and currency formats apply across the dashboard.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: High contrast and reduced motion apply globally.

highContrast.label: High contrast
highContrast.description: Enhances table borders and text contrast to improve visibility.

reducedMotion.label: Reduce motion
reducedMotion.description: Removes all transition effects to reduce dizziness.

large.label: Large
large.description: Body and tables are enlarged by 8%

preview.title: Live preview
preview.subtitle: See how the current preferences render.
preview.description: Font scale, contrast, and format options are applied in real-time to global tables and charts.
